column4: <wylde> gsr: System Settings >Displays ---> Change "Launcher PLacement" option. :)
I assume you already tried reverting to the previous options oon the client?
I didn't save them and can't remember :/
not sure if this will help ---   192.168.2.18:/home/wylde/print/Print /home/wylde/PDF nfs rw,hard,intr 0 0
that works for my nfs mount
ah, it's not nfs4? The ubuntu documentation says to mount it as type nfs4 with options _netdev,auto (but says not to use _netdev on wifi). Maybe it needs updating
yeah it is supposed to be nfs4, however using that as FS wouldn't mount
thanks, I'll try it and bbs
no dice, I guess maybe I have to check if I really did add my client's hostname to the server's list
while we were talking, I guess it got mounted :P
uht-oh that doesn't sound good lol
it does seem to load the file lists incredibly slowly, although when I open a video it plays more or less fine
ahh there may be a difference in performance not being nfs4, I don't need an real performance sine that nfs mount of mine is just a dropbox for pdf's that need to be printed :)
